about_the_game:
CHAT WITH US ON DISCORD







This water park is yours now. It’s up to you to make it great! Tear up the old stuff and bring in the new. Fix, repair, and repaint using a selection of tools. Plan and place different attractions and elements of your aquapark. Turn this place into an amazing attraction for families from all around the world.


Prepare the place first

The previous owners didn’t leave this place in a good condition. It’s now up to you to clean everything up and throw away what’s not needed. An aquapark is a place where cleanliness is super important.

Repair and restore

Some of the interiors, swimming pools, and other attractions here need your immediate attention. Use your tools to fix them step by step, put up the new tiles where the old ones used to be, and repaint what you can, so it looks nice and fresh.

Arrange the attractions

Here you can truly use your creativity. Manage different elements of the water park, from choosing the right swimming pools, water slides, jacuzzis, to building relaxation zones and beach bars. Everything is up to you, but always remember that people’s safety is one of the key factors of this business!


A dream come true

Become the owner of the greatest aquapark in the world. Make it a place where kids and adults are spending time in a friendly, fun atmosphere, and where they want to come back to as soon as they leave.



Visit us on Discord ->

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 / AMD R7-260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Build your own water park! Use plenty of tools to renovate the aquapark. Tear up what’s old, put up the tiles and paint the different elements. Choose from multiple water slides, giant fountains, plants, and relaxation zones. Use your creativity and have fun while doing it!
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hungarian
